Title: Misinformation undermining new tax laws – APC chieftain
Summary: According to him, widespread misinformation about the tax law has left many Nigerians, including educated people, confused about when and how their earnings will be taxed . The APC chieftain says misinformation is undermining new tax laws .

Title: NAF airstrikes neutralise over 40 terrorists in Borno
Summary: NAF airstrikes neutralise over 40 terrorists in Borno . This is contained in a statement by the Director of Public Relations and Information, Air Commodore Ehimen Ejodame .

Title: AFCON: How I was able to save Salah, Marmoush penalty kicks – Nwabali
Summary: Super Eagles goalkeeper Stanley Nwabali has explained how he managed to save penalty kicks from Egypt stars Mohamed Salah and Omar Marmoush .

Title: I regret recurrent political crises in Rivers – Fubara
Summary: Sir Siminalayi Fubara said as Governor every year has always started in bad light, saying that in the earlier part of the year, he regretted the recurrent political crises in Rivers . I’m still governor of Rivers State – Fubera . Rivers State Governor said he remains governor of the state .

Title: Yusuf to police: Arrest murderers of Kano woman, six children now
Summary: Governor Abba Yusuf directed the Kano State Police Command to swing into action to arrest murderers of Kano woman, Fatima Abubakar and her six children . The Governor who gave the directive in a statement by his spokesperson, Sanusi Bature, said the perpetrators should be arrested .
